figure.head: Table 1:
figure.figDesc:
Rendering time and memory usage on an SGI Indigo workstation. Times are in seconds and include shading, resampling,
projection and warping. The fast classification times include rendering with a parallel projection. The "Mem." field is the total size of
the data structures used by each algorithm.
